thread.title: $1 BEER AND OYSTERS FOR OLE MISS
thread.title_full: $1 BEER AND OYSTERS FOR OLE MISS

title: $1 BEER AND OYSTERS FOR OLE MISS
text:
$1 BEER AND OYSTERS FOR OLE MISS Where 
7:30 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 Categories 
Events, Food | Wine, Sports Did you know that One Eared Stag’s chef Robert Phalen attended Ole Miss? Well, now you’ll never forget, because he’s making $1 beer and oysters happen at the restaurant during every Ole Miss game. Watch Ole Miss on the bar-mounted TV while enjoying Miller High Life pony bottles and some of Atlanta’s best oysters on the half-shell, available for $1 during game time only. If you like Ole Miss football, chances are you also like beer and oysters. Come watch the game at One Eared Stag and don’t be surprised if Chef Phalen is yelling “HOTTY TODDY!” at the table next to you. Related
